channel.title: Need help with the jump behind the 'Doodle jump'
channel.description:
I'm trying to create a Doodle Jump-clone and I need some help with the logic behind the jump he performs.
I already know how to make the player jump up and let the platforms go down when the player reaches a specific boundary, but I need the jump to be more realistic. Like.. you start your jump with a certain speed and you slow down when you reach the max height of your jump, and when you start falling your speed increases again.
How would you make a sprite perform such a realistic jump?
I hope I've explained it well enough for everyone to understand.. if not, tell me :p
Thanks (:
Inb4 "Wrong category": this isn't programming-related, it's more about the logic of a jump?
